citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
Written program of veterinary care was not available during inspection. A written program detailing care to be
provided on a routine and emergency basis must be completed by licensee and the attending veterinarian, and
approved by both. A blank copy of an optional form to meet this requirement was provided to the licensee by email.
CORRECT BY 6-3-14
Exit interview conducted with facility personnel.

narrative:
2.40(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
Written program of veterinary care was not available during inspection. A written program detailing care to be
provided on a routine and emergency basis must be completed by licensee and the attending veterinarian, and
approved by both. A blank copy of an optional form to meet this requirement was provided to the licensee by email. 
CORRECT BY 6-3-14
Exit interview conducted with facility personnel.
